name: chatwork
description: Chatwork is a team communication platform featuring group chats, file sharing, and task management, aiming to enhance collaboration and productivity for businesses

tools.name: CHATWORK_DELETE_MESSAGE
tools.description: This tool allows you to delete a specific message from a Chatwork room by calling the DELETE endpoint at https://api.chatwork.com/v2/rooms/{room_id}/messages/{message_id}. It requires authentication using a Chatwork API token provided in the X-ChatWorkToken header, and the necessary permissions to delete messages in the specified room.

room_id.title: Room Id
room_id.description: The ID of the chat room containing the message to delete

message_id.title: Message Id
message_id.description: The ID of the message to delete

tools.name: CHATWORK_GET_CHATWORK_CONTACTS
tools.description: This tool retrieves a list of all contacts from Chatwork. It is a fundamental tool that fetches all contact information such as account_id, room_id, name, chatwork_id, organization details, department, and avatar image URL, without needing additional parameters beyond authentication.

tools.name: CHATWORK_GET_FILE
tools.description: This tool retrieves information about a specific file in a chat room. The API endpoint GET /v2/rooms/{room_id}/files/{file_id} provides file details such as file ID, account ID, message ID, filename, filesize, upload time, and download URL, which are useful for retrieving file metadata, verifying file existence, and managing file sharing within Chatwork.

inputSchema.title: GetFileRequest

file_id.title: File Id
file_id.description: The ID of the file to retrieve

room_id.title: Room Id
room_id.description: The ID of the chat room containing the file

inputSchema.description: Request model for getting file information.

tools.name: CHATWORK_GET_MY_STATUS
tools.description: This tool retrieves the current status of the authenticated user, including unread message counts and task status. It provides a quick overview of unread messages, mentions, and tasks, making it valuable for monitoring ChatWork activity and building automation workflows.

inputSchema.title: GetMyStatusRequest
inputSchema.description: Empty request model as no parameters are needed.

tools.name: CHATWORK_GET_ROOM_MEMBERS
tools.description: This tool retrieves a list of all members in a specified Chatwork room using the endpoint GET /rooms/{room_id}/members. It provides essential details like account_id, role, name, chatwork_id, organization_id, and organization_name, complementing the existing suite of room management tools.

room_id.title: Room Id
room_id.description: The ID of the room to get members from

tools.name: CHATWORK_GET_ROOM_MESSAGES
tools.description: This tool retrieves messages from a specific Chatwork room using the GET https://api.chatwork.com/v2/rooms/{room_id}/messages endpoint. It requires a room_id parameter and an optional force flag to refresh the cache by retrieving the 100 newest messages.

inputSchema.title: GetRoomMessagesRequest

force.title: Force
force.description: When true, retrieves the latest 100 messages regardless of previous calls

room_id.title: Room Id
room_id.description: The ID of the chat room to retrieve messages from

inputSchema.description: Request model for getting room messages

tools.name: CHATWORK_GET_ROOMS
tools.description: This tool retrieves a list of all chat rooms associated with the authenticated Chatwork account. It includes group chats, direct chats, and personal chats, and does not require any additional parameters beyond authentication.

inputSchema.title: GetRoomsRequest
inputSchema.description: Empty request model as no parameters are needed.

tools.name: CHATWORK_UPLOAD_FILE
tools.description: This tool allows users to upload files to a specific Chatwork room. It enables file sharing functionality within the Chatwork platform by providing an endpoint to upload files (along with an optional message) to a given room.

message.title: Message
message.description: Optional message to accompany the file upload

room_id.title: Room Id
room_id.description: The ID of the room where the file will be uploaded

file_path.title: File Path
file_path.description: The path to the file that needs to be uploaded
